participant_1.name: Sophia
participant_1.personality: Creative and positive, enjoys making people happy through her baking.
participant_1.background: My first cup of coffee in the morning inspires me to write and create content for my blog. Leaving my father behind when I immigrated to the United States. I enjoy creating beautiful wedding cakes for people to enjoy on their special day. I love wearing flip flops. I travel to the mountains and enjoy my free time.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Playful and reflective, has a passion for racing and enjoys spending time outdoors.
participant_2.background: I remember my first purchase of a pickle jar. I like to play outside. I sometimes wonder why I’m not married. People don’t like me too much but I like them anyways. I race cars for a living.

content.text: Good morning! Where are you from?
I was born and raised in New York City!
I have never been to New York City! I would love to go visit someday.
You should definitely come visit! It is the best city in the world!
I'm sure it is! I love to travel. What is your favorite thing about New York City?
There are so many things to love about New York City, but I think my favorite thing is the energy. There is always something going on, and it is always exciting.
That sounds amazing! I love the energy of big cities. I think I would fit right in there.
I'm sure you would! What do you do for a living?
I am a wedding cake baker! I love creating beautiful cakes for people to enjoy on their special day.
That sounds amazing! I bet you are very creative.
Thank you! I am a little bit. I love to come up with new designs and ideas.
I can imagine! I am not very creative, but I love to appreciate art.
That is totally fine! Everyone has their own strengths and weaknesses.
Exactly! I am glad you are so positive! I need to be more positive like you.
Thank you! I try to be. I think it is important to be positive and happy, even when things are tough.
I agree! I am going to try to be more positive from now on.
That's great! I am sure it will make a big difference in your life
